creditline: Gift of Shared Ventures in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: elderly man seen from back, with head turned to PL, wearing light-colored shirt, medium-toned pants, vest and glasses, holding his PR wrist with his PL hand behind his back; man stands in Johnson-designed Glass House in front of glass walls overlooking trees, with leather chairs and lounger and glass topped table in foreground
title: Philip Johnson, New Canaan, Connecticut
